text:
- Hudl is building the world's
largest database of sports,
video and data.

And we do that in order
to empower our teams,

our coaches and our athletes
to perform at their best.
But you can imagine pre-game,
I wanna understand my tendencies,
my opponent's tendencies.

In-game I wanna be able to
react to in-game situations,
adapt my strategy.
And then post-game, doing a retrospective,
understanding what happened,

and then of course, get
ready for the next scene.

We'll use CloudFront for
a multitude of things.

Of course, we've got our
standard VOD delivery,
and that's the bulk of our content.
We also have an OTT platform,
and CloudFront is critical
in the real-time delivery of that video.

We also use it for things like
our static asset delivery.

We do authentication at the
edge with Lambda at the edge.
One innovative thing that Hudl does

on top of CloudFront is
dynamic rendering for HOS.

We're able to store the
source video quality

and dynamic render all
the lower qualities of HOS
via CloudFront and Lambdas on the network.
Video is one of our largest cost drivers,

so keeping our cost under
control is essential,
and CloudFront allows us to do that.
It allows us to continually scale
as our business continues to scale,
but keep our costs under control.
We've been on AWS for a long time,

and we're proud and honored
to work really close

with our account team
and the product team.

It really has been a
partnership over the years,

and that's something we give a
lot of value to moving ahead.
